name: Inexplicable Geeks: Dawn of Just Us
description: Enter a world of ridiculously underpowered superheroes as you navigate a comic and pop culture convention celebrating their history. Gather stories, piece together history, and interact with the denizens of the super and the geek.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Storage: 420 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Storage: 420 MB available space
